title: Smocha
summary: Kenyan street food classic — a smokie stuffed with kachumbari and chili sauce, wrapped in soft chapati.
instructions: Boil or grill the smokie until cooked through.
Slice it lengthwise without cutting all the way through (pasua).
Stuff the inside with kachumbari.
Drizzle with chili sauce and vinegar if desired.
Wrap the whole smokie in a warm chapati.
Serve immediately while hot.

title: Mahindi Choma
summary: Charcoal-roasted maize, a Kenyan favorite street food snack.
instructions: Peel back the husk and remove silk.
Roast over charcoal or open flame, turning regularly.
Dip the lemon  slice in chili powder and rub it on the roasted maize.
Enjoy while hot.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
In a pan, fry pancetta with minced garlic until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and Parmesan together.
Drain spaghetti and mix quickly with pancetta.
Remove from heat, stir in egg mixture, season with pepper, and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice blend for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
In a pot, sauté onion in butter, add tomato puree and simmer.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Poke Bowl
summary: A fresh Hawaiian dish with marinated fish, vegetables, and rice.
instructions: Mix fish with soy sauce, sesame oil, and chili flakes. Marinate for 10 minutes.
Place rice in a bowl, top with fish, avocado, cucumber, and any toppings you like.
Serve immediately.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Sourdough topped with smashed avocado and chili flakes.
instructions: Toast sourdough until golden.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mixture over toast and sprinkle chili flakes.

title: Berry Smoothie
summary: A creamy blend of berries, yogurt, and honey.
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Serve chilled.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, toss lettuce with dressing.
Add croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.
